casebody.data:
Oregon Short Line and Utah Northern Railway Company v. Mullan. Error to the Supreme Court of the State of Oregon. No. 148.

Argued with No. 147.

Mr. John M. Thurston for plaintiff in error. Mr. John F. Dillon was on his brief. Mr. Alfred S. Bennett for defendant in error. Mr. Justice Shiras

: The facts of this ease are similar to those of the case of The Oregon Short Line and Northern Railway Company v. Jane Skottowe, just decided, and for the reasons there given the judgment of the Supreme Court of Oregon is

Affirmed.
